enWisdom: The cause of depression is jealousy

Wisdom: طَهِّرُوا قُلُوبَكُمْ مِنَ الْحَسَدِ فَإِنَّهُ مُكْمِدٌ مُضْنِي
enWisdom: Purify your hearts of jealousy, for it is a depressing enfeebler

Wisdom: كَمَا أَنَّ الصَّدَأَ يَأْكُلُ الْحَدِيدَ حَتَّى يُفْنِيَهُ كَذَلِكَ الْحَسَدُ يُكْمِدُ الْجَسَدَ حَتَّى يُفْنِيَهُ [يُضْنِيَهُ‏]
enWisdom: Just as rust corrodes iron until it causes it to waste away, so too does jealousy corrode the body until it wears away
One whose jealousy increases, his depression becomes prolonged
